item.title: Love Louder Tote By Britt + Bliss
item.dc:creator: Salamat Dough
item.description: A lightweight tote bag with a fun, colorful design that speaks volumes. Designed and hand printed by talented local artist, Britt + Bliss. All proceeds go to the LGBT Center of Raleigh.
item.content:encoded: Brittney, the creative mind behind @brittandbliss, is a talented artist who makes inspiring content, shirts, totes, and so much more, all designed and made from her studio. Whether you are part of the LGBTQIA+ community or an ally, we hope you can take part in our initiative as we will be donating 100% of the proceeds to the LGBT Center of Raleigh

item.title: Rainbow Confection
item.dc:creator: Salamat Dough
item.description: Colorful funfetti sugar cookie stuffed with a rainbow-colored birthday cake macaron from the incredibly talented Little Blue Macaron
item.content:encoded:
The Rainbow Confection is a sugar cookie stuffed with a rainbow-colored birthday cake macaron with brown butter filling from the mac queen herself, @littlebluemacaron. They are gorgeous when split in the middle, but let’s just be clear that both halves are still for you!

Contains: Wheat, Almonds, Milk, Soy, Butter, Eggs 

Manufactured in a facility that also processes nuts

item.title: Back to Black Sesame
item.dc:creator: Salamat Dough
item.description: Black sesame sugar cookie stuffed with a white chocolate black sesame filling
item.content:encoded:
Contains: Wheat, Sesame, Milk, Soy, Butter, Eggs 

Black Sesame Powder: Manufactured in a facility that produces products with nuts, gluten, and soy

Manufactured in a facility that also processes nuts

item.title: Insulated Cooler Packaging
item.dc:creator: Salamat Dough
item.description: Protect your shipment of tasty treats from the summer heat as they make their way to you
item.content:encoded:
Our insulated cooler packaging includes:

  • 1 insulated, water-resistant box liner
  • 1 or 2 ice packs depending on the box size

item.title: Nice to Calamansi You
item.dc:creator: Salamat Dough
item.description: Calamansi-infused sugar cookie with calamansi glaze
item.content:encoded:
This simple, yet tasty calamansi cookie is perfect for the warmer days ahead! If calamansi is new to you, it is a citrus hybrid, primarily cultivated in the Philippines. You can find it in desserts, drinks, and even marinades. My personal favorites are a tall glass of cold, sweetened calamansi juice or mixed with soy sauce for a great complement to grilled fish! Just like limes or lemons, it is very versatile. Our calamansi cookie is a sugar cookie with calamansi extract, topped with calamansi glaze. It is so soft and buttery.

Contains: Wheat, Butter, Eggs

Manufactured in a facility that also processes nuts

item.title: Somebunny to Love
item.dc:creator: Salamat Dough
item.description: Rich and buttery cookie dough base with pastel M&Ms, topped with mini eggs
item.content:encoded:
Take your favorite M&M cookie, but make it Easter. Somebunny to Love is a buttery cookie dough, full of M&Ms and topped with mini chocolate eggs. It could be an illusion, but for some reason these M&M cookies are just as tasty as they are cute!

Contains: Wheat, Milk, Soy, Butter, Eggs

Manufactured in a facility that also processes nuts. According to the M&M allergen information, it may also contain peanuts.

item.title: Matcha Made in Heaven
item.dc:creator: Salamat Dough
item.description: Matcha cookie with matcha caramelized white chocolate, strawberries, and roasted macadamia nuts
item.content:encoded:
This cookie combines my favorite boba order with one of my favorite cookie flavors, white chocolate macadamia. We start by caramelizing white chocolate for almost an hour and adding culinary grade matcha powder to create our own matcha-flavored, nutty chocolate. We then mix in some strawberries as well as roasted macadamia nuts for an extra crunch.

Contains: Wheat, Milk, Soy, Butter, Eggs, Macadamia Nuts

Manufactured in a facility that also processes nuts.

item.title: Equality Fleece Crewneck Sweatshirt
item.dc:creator: Salamat Dough
item.description: Cozy fleece sweatshirt with a hand-painted design and unisex sizing
item.content:encoded:
Great quality, hand printed sweatshirts to promote unity, allyship, and togetherness. This comfy sweatshirt comes in pink and is available in unisex sizing. 

  • 52% cotton, 48% polyester
  • Machine washable

We print these designs by hand using a screen printing process. Some colors are hand mixed, so the final color may differ slightly from what is shown here. Processing times could take up to two weeks depending on order volume and inventory.

item.title: Black Lives Still Matter T-Shirt
item.dc:creator: Salamat Dough
item.description: Hand-printed, comfortable, and comes in unisex sizing
item.content:encoded:
Great quality, handmade shirts to show there is more to it than posting a black square on Instagram. This shirt comes in black and is available in unisex sizing. 

  • 100% cotton
  • 5.3 oz midweight
  • Machine washable

We print these designs by hand using a screen printing process, so the final result may differ slightly from what is shown here. Processing times could take up to two weeks depending on order volume and inventory.

item.title: The Red Carpet Treatment
item.dc:creator: Salamat Dough
item.description: Red velvet cookie with cheesecake filling and topped with white chocolate chips
item.content:encoded:
The Red carpet treatment is just like your favorite red velvet cake, but in cookie form. It turned itself inside out for ease of eating. These cookies have a slight hint of cocoa and tangy creaminess from the cream cheese center. The vibrant red color makes it perfect for your quaran-date!

Contains: Wheat, Milk, Eggs, and Soy

Manufactured in a facility that also processes nuts.
